name: Gladiator Arena (Paul)
description:
Gladiator Arena is an early prototype of a sword-fighting game where the main idea is that you will be pitted against enemies that will become more dangerous and will put your skills to the test. 

Finally you will be up against the emperor in a life or death fight for your freedom.

The game is heavily inspired by the movie Gladiator, as you can tell, but the enemies you face will slowly become something out of a Mad Max movie.

  • Movement: WASD
  • Attacking: SPACE/Left Click

The development of this game is on hold, but I will continue working on it somewhere in the future, who knows.
